channel.title: AWS on devopstales
channel.description: Recent content in AWS on devopstales

item.title: Elastic Container Registry Integration with EKS
item.description: In this pos I will show you how you can integrate your Elastic Container Registry with EKS.

item.title: AWS - pfsense: Site-to-site VPN using static routes
item.description: In this post I willll show you how to configure a VPN between pfSense and AWS using static routes.

item.title: Using AWS Prometheus (AMP) for monitoring AWS EKS cluster.
item.description: In this pos I will show you how you can install the AWS managed Prometheus Service for EKS monitoring.

item.title: Deploy Ingress Controller to EKS cluster with WAF
item.description: In this pos I will show you how you can install the AWS Load Balancer Controller on EKS Cluster with WAF protection.

item.title: Create EKS Cluster with eksctl
item.description: In this pos I will show you how you can install an AWS managed Elastic Kubernetes Service with ekscli.

item.title: AWS EKS Network Solutions
item.description: In this post I will analyse the available CNI plugins for Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service.
